turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to place an order at Bella Luna for four gluten-free medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza order at bella luna sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yap, four medium, glutton-free. And, in terms of topping I guess I want one to be pepperoni, one to be supreme, another one to be half chicken barbeque and half sausage, and then the fourth and last one I want to be another.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or to be a meat lovers pizza, I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: gluten free, 1 with pepperoni, 1 with supreme, 1 half chicken BBQ half sausage, and 1 with meat lover, is that your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so with 4 medium pizzas your total comes to 76 dollars, shall we go ahead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Those are expensive little pizzas, aren't they?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gracious, all right. Well, they better be the best pizzas in the world.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i hope so too. your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't think I can afford anything else.
